english.segment1: My decision can not be put off again. I see the right choice but my heart is filled with dread. It all seems backwards in my head, my head
english.segment2: I know it seems too wrong to be right. This way is so much harder to fight. But in the end I know it is true. This way is better, it's better for you
english.segment3: Choose a little pain and gain a life with joy. Accepting pleasure now will earn a life of pain. It all seems backwards in my head, my head

english.segment5: Sometimes I wonder why it's this way. When it's done the burden is gone. This discomfort will be taken away. As soon as it's over, it's over for me
